title: Monopolistic competitor long run P exceeds MC

content.question: In the long run, a monopolistically competitive firm is allocatively inefficient because the firm will

choices.label: produce only when marginal cost is greater than marginal revenue
produce only when marginal revenue is greater than marginal cost
charge a price greater than the marginal cost

content.answer: charge a price greater than the marginal cost

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
